analysis.description:
XRPCToken (/unique_contracts/0xe8433116974b18a50636f030f6635e3870220d5c.sol#96-103) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0xe8433116974b18a50636f030f6635e3870220d5c.sol#96-97)

newCrowdsale.forwardFunds has external calls inside a loop:
	- owners[i].transfer(amountToBeSent) (/unique_contracts/0xe8433116974b18a50636f030f6635e3870220d5c.sol#203-207)

newCrowdsale.forwardFunds has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(owners[i],partnerTokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0xe8433116974b18a50636f030f6635e3870220d5c.sol#210)

newCrowdsale.majorOwnerShares should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xe8433116974b18a50636f030f6635e3870220d5c.sol#117-119)
newCrowdsale.minorOwnerShares should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xe8433116974b18a50636f030f6635e3870220d5c.sol#119-120)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xe8433116974b18a50636f030f6635e3870220d5c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0xe8433116974b18a50636f030f6635e3870220d5c.sol#8-11): it allows old versions
Parameter '_daysToStart' of newCrowdsale.newCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0xe8433116974b18a50636f030f6635e3870220d5c.sol#147) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_walletMajorOwner' of newCrowdsale.newCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0xe8433116974b18a50636f030f6635e3870220d5c.sol#147) is not in mixedCase
